TEXT.TITLE: ARGENTINE PORT WORKERS TAKE INDUSTRIAL ACTION
TEXT.BODY: Argentine port workers began an indefinite protest against safety conditions at the port of Buenos Aires, stopping work for one hour per shift, a press spokesman said. He said three port workers had died over the last month in accidents. He said the decision to take action was made after a port worker died yesterday after being electrocuted. Reuter
